Package database_servers

Contains all the classes useful to the handling of both SQL and No-Sql databases these classes are useful for synchronization and data retrieval.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CachePinger
    CachePinger class: it retrieves the list of active cache servers and "pings" them one by one.
    CacheServicesThread  
    CheckerDB
    Utility class to manage the request and response message according to the protocol
    ConnectionDbThread
    A thread called when a connection from the L2 servers is created.
    InitDb  
    ManageCS  
    ManageDb  
    PopulateDb
    Utility class to populate the relational database using an external file (media//populate_db//entry1.txt in this case)
    RDBManager
    Manage the requests done by the ConnectionDbThread.
    UtilitiesDb  

Package database_servers Description

Contains all the classes useful to the handling of both SQL and No-Sql databases these classes are useful for synchronization and data retrieval.
